title: Electronic Organizer Travel USB Cable Accessories Bag/Case,Waterproof for Power Bank,Charging Cords,Chargers,Mouse ,Earphones Flash Drive
descriptions:
Keep your small gadgets neat and easy to find with the Electronic Organizer Travel USB Cable Accessories Bag/Case.

Simple to use
- Two roomy sections: open it like a book. One side for small items (cards, cables), the other for bigger items (phone, charger, power bank).
- Clear pockets and straps hold things in place so they don’t slide around.

Safe and sturdy
- Waterproof and shockproof material protects your belongings from spills and bumps.
- Soft, padded inside keeps items safe.
- Strong, durable build for everyday use.

Easy to carry
- Small and light: about 7.5 in long, 4.3 in wide, 2.2 in high. It fits in a handbag, backpack, or luggage.
- Carry by hand or use the handy belt/strap.

What it can hold
- Phone, charger, cables, batteries, power bank.
- Hearing aid batteries and accessories.
- SD cards, flash drives, external hard drive.
- Earphones, connector adapters.
- Pens, pencil, eraser, highlighter.
- Keys, passport, small camera, selfie stick.
- Basic first-aid items, small scissors.
- Makeup and other small personal items.

Flexible use
- Perfect at home to keep a “go bag” of tech and essentials in one place.
- Great for travel or family visits.
- Doubles as a cosmetic or toiletry pouch.

What you receive
- 1 Electronics Organizer Bag/Case.

Peace of mind
- If you are not satisfied or find a defect, contact us for a replacement or refund.

In short: this is a small, tough, easy-to-carry bag that keeps your cords, phone, and other small items tidy and protected—so you always know where everything is.
